ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
LightCurveLynx aims to provide a flexible, scalable, and user-friendly time-domain
simulation software with realistic effects and survey strategies. The software
package consists of multiple stages: a flexible framework for consistently
sampling model parameters, realistic models of time varying phenomena (such as
supernovae and AGNs), effect models (such as dust extinction), and survey
characteristics (such as cadence, filters, and noise).
about.summary: A Fast and Nimble Package for Time Domain Astronomy

about.description:
LightCurveLynx aims to provide a flexible, scalable, and user-friendly time-domain
simulation software with realistic effects and survey strategies. The software
package consists of multiple stages: a flexible framework for consistently
sampling model parameters, realistic models of time varying phenomena (such as
supernovae and AGNs), effect models (such as dust extinction), and survey
characteristics (such as cadence, filters, and noise).
about.summary: A Fast and Nimble Package for Time Domain Astronomy

name: lightcurvelynx
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "lightcurvelynx" %}
{% set version = "0.2.5" %}
{% set python_min = "3.10" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/lightcurvelynx-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4567288874636c03a229dd560234294a2fd35b558c7cbb9ccf261d902db280a0

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}.*
    - setuptools >=62
    - setuptools-scm >=6.2
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - astropy-base
    - cdshealpix
    - citation-compass >=0.0.3
    - matplotlib-base
    - mocpy
    - nested-pandas
    - networkx
    - numpy >=2
    - pandas
    - pooch
    - PyYAML >=6
    - regions
    - scipy
    - tqdm

test:
  imports:
    - lightcurvelynx
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: https://github.com/lincc-frameworks/lightcurvelynx
  summary: 'A Fast and Nimble Package for Time Domain Astronomy'
  description: |
    LightCurveLynx aims to provide a flexible, scalable, and user-friendly time-domain
    simulation software with realistic effects and survey strategies. The software
    package consists of multiple stages: a flexible framework for consistently
    sampling model parameters, realistic models of time varying phenomena (such as
    supernovae and AGNs), effect models (such as dust extinction), and survey
    characteristics (such as cadence, filters, and noise).
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jeremykubica
    - hombit
    - mi-dai
    - olivialynn
